payload.text: To request an transfer out your BT account, please select the 'Chat with consultant' button and consultant will assist you further. You may also contact us on 1300 784 207 8:30am to 6:30pm Monday to Friday (Sydney time).

Your financial adviser on file can perform asset transfers on your Panorama account at your request. You are able to view your adviser's details in the 'Account details' section on the navigation menu.

You are able to complete an asset transfer for a clients account by following these steps:
1. Select client
2. Select 'Asset Transfer' from the navigation menu.
3. Complete the fields required.
For further assistance please select the 'Help & Support' button.
